product_meta.title: BenQ VW2430H 24-Inch LED-Lit PC/Mac Compatible Monitor (Brilliant White)
product_meta.description:
BenQ VW2430H VA LED Monitor - A new addition to BenQ's stylishly innovative VW Series lineup. Featuring VA panel technology, LED backlighting, Macbook compatibility and multiple input options, this high-tech work of art is designed to make the perfect style statement for users seeking premium visual enjoyment, outstanding multimedia performance and versatility in an exquisite package. The Perfect MacBook Companion! M-book mode built via BenQ’s exclusive Senseye Human Vision technology, which incorporates six proprietary calibration techniques to achieve the best viewing quality in each of its pre-set viewing modes, this special mode enables the VW2430H to faithfully preserve the color quality of a Macbook display so that users can enjoy the view of their Macbook on a bigger screen. The Reading Mode recreates the comfortable experience of reading actual books by adjusting the monitor’s color temperature and brightness, as well as balancing its contrast ratio and sharpness, to simulate the look of paperback paper. An ultra-high native contrast of 5000:1, which is five times of that of general panels, adds astonishing color depth and definition to dark, complex images with the greatest subtlety and clarity. With a native contrast ratio this high, you can expect an infinite dynamic contrast ratio that far exceeds your expectations.

AMAZON.COM
 

FROM THE MANUFACTURER


SIMPLY WHITE. SIMPLY BRILLIANT.


BenQ VW2430H embodies simple living with eco-friendly sophistication while keeping things fresh with clean, curvy lines, unconventional asymmetric form and a uniquely designed docking accessory that serves as a holder for your mobile phone and cards.






ADD A TOUCH OF SOPHISTICATION TO YOUR HOME OR OFFICE DÉCOR


BenQ VW2430H VA LED monitor – A new addition to BenQ’s monitor lineup. Featuring VA panel technology, LED backlighting, PC and Macbook compatibility and multiple input options, this high-tech work of art designed to make the perfect style statement for users seeking premium visual enjoyment, outstanding multimedia performance and versatility in an exquisite, eco-friendly package.





THE PERFECT MACBOOK COMPANION
M-book mode built via BenQ’s exclusive Senseye® Human Vision technology, which incorporates six proprietary calibration techniques to achieve the best viewing quality in each of its pre-set viewing modes, this special mode enables the VW2430H to faithfully preserve the color quality of a Macbook display so that users can enjoy the view of their Macbook on a bigger screen. 







BRILLIANT IMAGE QUALITY




Deep Blacks and Minimized Light Leakage
Enjoy the flawless layering and precise contrast detail in even the darkest images! Free of bright spots with low light leakage, VA panels are designed to deliver naturally deeper blacks with optimum contrast performance.




5,000:1 Native Contrast Ratio for Color Depth and Definition
An ultra-high native contrast of 5000:1, which is five times that of general panels, adds astonishing color depth and definition to darkened, detailed images with the greatest subtlety and clarity. With a native contrast ratio this high, you can expect an infinite dynamic contrast ratio that far exceeds your expectations.



True 8-bit Color Performance
An 8-bit VA panel delivers smoother and more stable color transitions by rendering a total of 16.7 million color shades simultaneously. A 6-bit panel with Advanced Frame Rate Control (ARFC) requires interpolation to display the same number of colors as a true 8-bit panel does.



178°/178° Wide-Viewing Angles
VA panels bring truly authentic colors and ultra sharp details to your eyes with a wide-viewing angle of 178°/178°. Viewing, as you know it, will never be the same.





TRUE PURE WHITE
No printing. No coating. Free from harmful chemicals, the VW2430H is pure in design and refreshing for the modern minds. 




A PLACE FOR CARD & PHONE
An extra accessory inspired from mountains adds a piece of scenery to your desk as well as serves as a card or mobile phone holder. 




A TRAY FOR SMALL KEEPSAKES
Store thumbtacks and paperclips using the small tray on the base stand to keep your desk nice and organized. 






READING MODE FOR AN OPTIMIZED READING EXPERIENCE
The Reading Mode recreates the comfortable experience of reading actual books by adjusting the monitor’s color temperature and brightness, as well as balancing its contrast ratio and sharpness, to simulate the look of a paperback. The high contrast ratio characteristic of the VA panel enables this upgraded feature to maintain high text clarity at low screen brightness settings, without irritating your eyes. In turn, this helps reduce the risk of eye strain caused by prolonged focus on computer monitors. 




IMPROVED ECO MODE FOR HIGHER ENERGY EFFICIENCY
The improved Eco Mode adjusts the backlight brightness level to ensure the highest display quality is presented to you with the highest energy efficiency. This intelligent mode reduces at least 37% of the power consumed by document viewing, Internet browsing and emailing and up to 44% of the power consumed by gaming. 







HDMI MULTIMEDIA INTERFACE
The latest HDMI high-speed multimedia interface makes VW2430H incredibly convenient to use – now you can enjoy digital entertainment effortlessly even with additional multimedia equipment in the future.
